H0.text: Which crop is attacked by the Colorado Beetle. Potato

H1.text: Which crop is attacked by the Colorado Beetle. Tomato

H2.text: Which crop is attacked by the Colorado Beetle. Corn

H3.text: Which crop is attacked by the Colorado Beetle. Spud

A4.text: The Colorado potato beetle is a beetle known for being a major pest of potato crops.

A5.text: Colorado potato beetles pose significant dangers to potatoes, which are a quintessential agricultural crop.
